text: He kidnapped a milan from a horn, rising through the air. The hornet turned and bit him, falling both from above to a precipice, and the milan died. Then the raven said, "You fool! Why did you want to hurt someone who didn't? In justice, you've been punished for abducting me without cause. Don't try to hurt your neighbor, because he might be stronger than you.
title: El milano y la culebra
author: nan Esopo
